name_localized.en: Deluxe Accessible King Room City View
name_localized.es: Deluxe Accessible King Room City View

short_description_localized.en: Measuring 350 square feet, ADA-compliant Deluxe Rooms evoke a spacious residential feel with three-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views. These rooms are situated on floors 5 to 21.

images.name: Deluxe-Accessible-King-Room-City-View-Deluxe-ADA-Room
images.caption: Deluxe ADA Room
images.description: Spectacular city views and spacious accommodations define our Deluxe Rooms.
images.alt: The comfortable and spacious Deluxe Room overlooks the city’s stunning Manhattan skyline. The room has a plush king sized bed - a night stand with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock is located on one side and an executive writing desk and chair is located on the other side of the bed. An arm chair with side table, 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar is located across the bed.   The marble three fixture bathroom features a pedestal sink, 30 x 60” roll-in shower removable bath seat, plush bathrobes and towels and exclusive Etro toiletries.

images.name: Deluxe-Accessible-King-Room-City-View-City-View-4-Piece-Bathroom
images.caption: City View 4 Piece Bathroom
images.description: Turkish marble bathroom with over-sized shower head, lighted bathroom mirror and Etro Bath amenities
images.alt: The marble three fixture bathroom features a pedestal sink, 30 x 60” roll-in shower removable bath seat, plush bathrobes and towels and exclusive Etro toiletries.
